original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 22.30. Sanidassanattika, Āsavagocchaka
analyzed: sa ni dassa na ttika āsava gocchaka

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham noāsavam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ āsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na noāsavam dhammam paṭicca sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ noāsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate ekavīsa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na sāsavam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ sa āsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa adhipatiyā ekavīsa pe avigate ekavīsa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na anāsavam dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ anāsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na āsava sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ āsava sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naāsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na āsava vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe
analyzed: āsava vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa ārammaṇe

original: tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: tīṇi pe avigate ekavīsa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: na sa nidassana sappaṭigham na āsavam ca iva na anāsavam ca dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: āsavo ceva sāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: āsavaḥ ca iva sa āsavaḥ ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na anāsavam ca iva na no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa,
analyzed: sa āsavaḥ ca iva no ca āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa

original: ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate ekavīsa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: na sa nidassana sappaṭigham na āsavam ca iva na āsava vippayuttam ca dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
analyzed: āsavo ca iva āsava sampayuttaḥ ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā

original: tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham na āsava vippayuttam ca iva na no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca a nidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
analyzed: āsava sampayuttaḥ ca iva no ca āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā

original: tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham āsava vippayuttam na sa āsavam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa,
analyzed: āsava vippayuttaḥ sa āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa

original: adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: adhipatiyā ekavīsa pe avigate ekavīsa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham āsava vippayuttam na anāsavam dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: āsava vippayuttaḥ anāsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
